inspo_items.copy_rewrite_universal: Congrats, you doomscrolled far enough to find an artist so small they know their fans by name and profile pic (try me).
inspo_items.why_it_works: Reframes being small as intimacy not failure. Creates FOMO/curiosity. The playful challenge invites comments and personal connection.
inspo_items.description: Self-aware doomscroll hook that positions smallness as intimacy/connection.
inspo_items.how_to_use: Adapt to your niche/genre. Add proof in comments (respond to names/pfps). Works as selfie or casual performance footage.

inspo_items.copy_rewrite_universal: I am not big yet, but if this pops up on your feed, interact. If people start using this sound, it could actually move.
inspo_items.why_it_works: Authentic ask lowers resistance. Visual raw to polished transformation mirrors the energy shift, creating payoff. Early-adopter psychology: viewers feel they can help something take off.
inspo_items.description: Starts raw/no colour grade then switches to polished when the drop hits.
inspo_items.how_to_use: Start without filters/grade to feel raw, then apply grading when the drop hits to match the energy shift.

inspo_items.copy_rewrite_universal: Wild how only the person with the best taste in the group is going to find this.
inspo_items.why_it_works: Flattery plus identity targeting. Creates gatekeeper dynamic. Simple copy rides trend frameworks while the visual hook adds pattern-interrupt.
inspo_items.description: Physical visual hook plus trend copy that flatters the viewer.
inspo_items.how_to_use: Create a physical visual hook plus trending copy framework that flatters the viewer taste.

inspo_items.copy_rewrite_universal: Slide 1: Long intros are boring, I always skip. Slide 2: meme about quitting right before the payoff. Slide 3: Give us 40 seconds. It is worth it.
inspo_items.why_it_works: Acknowledges the objection upfront. Visual meme reframes skipping as missing out. Specific timeframe makes the ask feel easy. Slideshow builds tension.
inspo_items.description: 3-slide objection to meme to promise structure.
inspo_items.how_to_use: Create 3 slides: objection, meme metaphor, timeframe promise. Use your own photos for slides 1 and 3.

music_first_variants.caption: Melodic techno payoff in under 10s. Wait for it. #mbp_seed270

inspo_items.copy_rewrite_universal: I am looking for people who love [niche]. If that is you, welcome aboard.
inspo_items.why_it_works: Ultra-targeted call-out feels personal. Welcome aboard creates belonging. Casual daily-life footage lowers production barrier and feels authentic.
inspo_items.description: Directly calls out niche fans in a casual daily-life setting.
inspo_items.how_to_use: Film during daily activities. Address your niche audience by name. Make it a personal invitation. Keep it welcoming.

inspo_items.copy_rewrite_universal: POV: the player is about to cook.
inspo_items.why_it_works: POV is immersive. About to cook is casual and builds anticipation. Behind-the-scenes footage feels insider and authentic.
inspo_items.description: Studio/rehearsal POV showing someone about to perform; simple anticipation hook.
inspo_items.how_to_use: Film casual POV rehearsal/studio footage right before a performance/moment. Keep text simple and anticipation-based.
